text: Motion
...The training camp is over now, isn't it?
Ah, how was it?
Yeah... I think it was good.

I felt like I could focus more since I didn't have
to think about anything other than practice.

I see...
I'm relieved.

I thought maybe Mikoto didn't need
a training camp...
...Why?

Because you practices excessively even on normal days, right?
I thought there might not have been a need for this extra time.

But sometimes, a change in environment
can help you focus better or provide a change of pace.

If it served as a change of pace,
then I suppose it was worthwhile.
...Maybe you're right.
Thank you, Producer.

Huh?
For what?
For preparing such a good environment like this...

Oh, that's what you mean.
It's only natural. I'm your producer, after all.

...I see.
Then, as an idol.
I have to create the best stage possible.

That's right. I'm looking forward to seeing
the results of the training camp.
...Yeah.
